messageCreate.contact: please contact a server administrator to get this settled
messageCreate.noPerms: Need permission to react as all of my features use reactions
messageCreate.perms: You don't have the required permissions to use this command
messageCreate.noRoles: There are no roles in your message, provide some by following this example
messageCreate.noReact: I don't have permission to add reactions so this may not work correctly.
messageCreate.maxRoles: You can only have a maximum of 20 roles in your message.
messageCreate.unknown: There are unknown roles in your message, please remove them and try again.
messageCreate.duplicate: There are duplicate roles in your message, please remove them and try again
messageCreate.positions: There are roles with higher ranks (position) than my highest role in your message, please remove them and try again

messageReactionAdd.title: title
messageReactionAdd.end: ended the poll early. These are the final results
messageReactionAdd.tooFast: You are reacting too fast! Please wait a few seconds before reacting again.
messageReactionAdd.endNone: No one entered into the giveaway, so there are no winners
messageReactionAdd.noPerms: I do not have permission to give role {role}

messageReactionRemove.title: Title
messageReactionRemove.tooFast: You are reacting too fast! Please wait a few seconds before reacting again.
messageReactionRemove.noPerms: I do not have permission to remove role {role}

roles.description: Setup a reaction role message for your server
roles.already: You already have an active message collector going on! Finish that first before starting a new one.
roles.pick: Provide what you would like the type of message to be sent. Options: `embed`, `content`
roles.ended: The message collector has ended after 25 minutes.
roles.react: Send a message you would like to be as your reaction role message. After that is done, react  with emojis in order of the roles you want to be added to the message.
roles.react2:
Once you're done, react with ✅ to complete it.
To cancel this reaction collector, react with ❌ to stop it!
roles.noPerms: I require the `AssignRoles` permission to add roles to users.
roles.max: You can only have a maximum of 12 reaction role messages in your server.
roles.noRoles: There are no reaction role messages setup currently. To add some, type
roles.delete: Provide an ID for the reaction role message to delete it
roles.edit: Provide an ID for the reaction role message to edit it
roles.notFound: I could not find a reaction role message with that ID.
roles.deleted: Successfully deleted that reaction role message.
roles.explain2: When you create a reaction message (`f!roles create`), you will need to provide it with roles (format: `{role:Blue}`) and I will copy your message. React to my message to automatically update the roles and once you are finished, react with ✅ to complete it.

second.end: To get more information about a command, type

giveaway.description: Creates a giveaway. Reactions have 3 second cooldown.
giveaway.tooMany: This server has 15 giveaways currently running. Wait until one finishes before making anymore!
giveaway.validChannel:
Please provide a valid channel mention or channel ID.
Example
giveaway.validChannel2: Note: If you are using a channel ID, provide it after the requirement text
giveaway.validTime:
Please provide a valid time.
Example
giveaway.validWinners:
Please provide the amount of winners. Maximum: 5
Example
giveaway.ormore:
Giveaways can only be 5 minutes or above in time!
Example
giveaway.orless:
Please provide a time shorter than 365 days.
Example
giveaway.format:
You failed to follow the giveaway format.
Example
giveaway.formatWinners:
You failed to properly specific how many winners there are
Example
giveaway.maxwins:
When making a giveaway, you can only have a maximum of 5 winners.
Example
giveaway.noperms: I do not have permission to send messages in
giveaway.noperms2: I do not have permission to view
giveaway.noperms3: I do not have permission to add reactions in

polls.description: Creates a poll. Reactions have 3 second cooldown.
polls.tooMany: You already have 5 polls running. Wait for one to end before creating anymore.
polls.validTime:
Please provide a valid time.
Example
polls.longerThan:
Please provide a time longer than 30 seconds.
Example
polls.shorterThan:
Please provide a time shorter than 30 days.
Example
polls.validOption:
Please provide the first option for the question. Maximum of 10 options.
Example
polls.validOption2:
Please provide the second option for the question. Maximum of 10 options.
Example
polls.maxOptions:
Please provide a maximum of 10 options.
Example
polls.title: Title

reroll.description: Reroll winners from giveaways. Winner number is based on the order of the winners in the embed.
reroll.usage: [Message ID] [Winner Number, E.g. 1, 2, all | Default: all]
reroll.validID: Please provide a valid message ID.
reroll.notValid: I could not find a giveaway message with that ID.
reroll.winners: Please provide a winner number (E.g. 1, 2, 3) or use `all` to reroll all winners!
reroll.notHosted: You can't reroll this giveaway because you didn't host it!
reroll.noUsers: There are no users in this giveaway to reroll!
reroll.noPicks: There are no more users that can be picked for rerolling!
reroll.reroll: The giveaway was rerolled! New winner(s)
reroll.error: Unable to send message for new winners

prefix.tooMany: Prefix cannot be longer than 8 characters.
prefix.description: Changes default prefix to your own

credits.thankyou: As developer of Functious, I wanted to thank everyone who contributed toward the bot.
credits.thankyou2: The bot wouldn't be where it is without all of you, thank you!
credits.title: Credits

language.description: Changes the language of the bot
language.change: You can change your server's language by picking an available language.

giveawaysEnd.noUsers: No one entered into the giveaway so I couldn't pick a winner
giveawaysEnd.warn2: [Channel Post] Unable to post to channel

poll.end: This poll has ended and these are the results
